message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a high-value product. I believe you'll find it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product you're offering. However, my budget allows me to pay up to $1500000 for such an item. I would like to propose this counteroffer.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1400000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1350000.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $1700000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm glad we're able to continue negotiating. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1600000.
I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers and offer the product to you for $1800000.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. After considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1750000.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one final compromise and offer the product to you for $1900000.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1850000.
